## Writable.set() method

Replaces store's state with the provided value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(value: T): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T | value to be used as the new state of a store. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
